dungeon.logic.Board

    • Uses of Board in dungeon.logic

      Methods in dungeon.logic that return Board 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Board DungeonKeep.getBoard()
      Returns the current board
      Methods in dungeon.logic with parameters of type Board 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Hero.catchKey(Board board, int level)
      Checks if the hero catches the key.
      void Ogre.manageOgreLetter(Board board) 
      boolean Character.moveCharacter(Board board)
      Changes the coordinates of the characters according the moving direction, if the movement is valid
      boolean Ogre.moveClub(Board board)
      Establishes a random position for the club.
      void Suspicious.moveGuard(Board board)
      Moves the Suspicious, and randomly makes him switch direction for a while (the probability of taking the normal route is higher than the probability of taking the inverse route)
      void Rookie.moveGuard(Board board)
      Moves the Rookie and establishes his lethal tiles (tiles that kill the hero)
      void Guard.moveGuard(Board board) 
      void Drunken.moveGuard(Board board)
      Moves the Drunken character in the board.
      void Hero.moveHero(char playerInput, Board board, int level)
      Moves the hero according the the user input.
      void Ogre.moveOgre(Board board, Hero hero)
      Moves the ogre and his club.
      void Club.setHeroClub(Board board, int level)
      Places the hero club in the board of the second level
